name: Flappy Bird 3D (Harsith Parekh)
description: Flappy Bird was a 2D game made by Dong Nguyen. It was a big hit in 2014. But for some reason (you can get videos online about why the game was taken down ) it was taken down.  This is the recreation of that game in 3D. I made tps, fps, and 2D version of the game. You can get all 3 types in one game. Thank You .
